IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: BRENTWOOD ACADEMY IS A COEDUCATIONAL, INDEPENDENT, COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL.
IRS990.MissionDesc: BRENTWOOD ACADEMY IS A COEDUCATIONAL, INDEPENDENT, COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL DEDICATED TO NURTURING AND CHALLENGING EACH WHOLE PERSON - BODY, MIND, AND SPIRIT - TO THE GLORY OF GOD IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE ACADEMY'S STATEMENT OF FAITH.
IRS990.Desc: BRENTWOOD ACADEMY OFFERS A WIDE VARIETY OF PROGRAMS UNDER THE MAJOR PROGRAM SERVICE TITLE OF "ACADEMICS." APPROXIMATELY 800 STUDENTS ARE CURRENTLY SERVED BY THE ACADEMY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL APPROPRIATIONS OF ENDOWMENT INVESTMENT RETURN ARE USED TO SUPPORT THE ACADEMY'S OVERALL MISSION. IN PARTICULAR, AVAILABLE FUNDS MAY BE USED TO SUPPLEMENT STUDENT FINANCIAL AID IN A GIVEN ACADEMIC YEAR.
THE ANNUAL HANDBOOK CONTAINS A SPECIFIC REFERENCE TO THE NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY OF BRENTWOOD ACADEMY. IN ADDITION, THE ACADEMY PUBLICIZED ITS NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY THROUGH MEDIA PUBLICATION.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.ValuationMethodUsedDesc: FINANCIAL NEED ASSESSED BY STUDENT SUPPORT SERVICES AND ORGANIZATION (FMV)
GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: NEED-BASED FINANCIAL AID (NONCASH REDUCTION OF STUDENT TUITION).

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL AID REPRESENTS NON-CASH FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE PROVIDED TO QUALIFYING FAMILIES BASED ON NEED. THE ACADEMY AWARDS AID TO WORTHY STUDENTS BASED SOLEY ON FINANCIAL NEED. AN OUTSIDE SERVICE REVIEWS THE APPLICATIONS FOR FINANCIAL AID AND RECOMMENDS THE MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF ASSISTANCE FOR EACH APPLICANT. THE ACADEMY REVIEWS THE RECOMMENDATIONS AND DETERMINES THE AMOUNT OF EACH SCHOLARSHIP GRANT.
UPON APPROVAL OF BOARD, SPOUSE AS NEEDED MAY ACCOMPANY HEADMASTER ON TRIPS. MEMBERSHIP FEES ASSOCIATED WITH LOCAL SERVICE ORGANIZATIONS IS PROVIDED.
HEADMASTER PARTICIPATES IN A SUPPLEMENTAL NONQUALIFIED DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN UNAVAILABLE TO OTHER EMPLOYEES.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT BOARD OF WILLIAMSON COUNTY TENNESSEE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCE COMMITTEE IS PRESENTED WITH A COPY OF FORM 990 FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO ISSUANCE. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE HAS AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD REGARDING APPROVAL OF FORM 990 FOR ISSUANCE. ANY MEMBER OF THE BOARD MAY RECEIVE COPY OF FORM 990 UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS UPDATED EACH YEAR WITH NEW BOARD AND BOARD MONITORS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEADMASTER IS THE ONLY EMPLOYEE HIRED AND DISMISSED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WILL APPOINT A COMMITTEE EACH SPRING TO PERFORM AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW OF THE HEADMASTER, AS WELL AS RESEARCH COMPARABLE COMPENSATION PACKAGES OF OTHER HEADMASTERS INCLUDING INDUSTRY DATA FROM REGIONAL AND NATIONAL ASSOCIATIONS. THE COMMITTEE WILL REPORT TO THE FULL BOARD OF TRUSTEES IN MAY OF EACH YEAR WITH A SUMMARY OF THE REVIEW PROCESS AS WELL AS A COMPENSATION RECOMMENDATION. THE FULL BOARD OF TRUSTEES, IN EXECUTIVE SESSION WILL RECEIVE THE REPORT, DISCUSS AND VOTE ON THE COMMITTEE'S RECOMMENDATION. THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WILL THEN REVIEW THE REPORT AND ACTIONS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WITH THE HEADMASTER. UPON AGREEMENT, THE REPORT AND ACTIONS WILL BE DELIVERED BY THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES TO THE ASSISTANT HEADMASTER TO FILE AND ENACT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL OF THE REFERENCED DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
BOARD UNDER THE GUIDANCE PROVIDED BY FINANCE COMMITTEE SELECTS INDEPENDENT AUDITOR AND ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF AUDIT. THIS PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR.
